data.name: Spire of Sorcery – Support the Developers!
data.detailed_description:
Support our team – and get a few fun in-game items!

  • an original alternative background for the game's main menu
  • an option to change the colour of the player party icon to crimson in the travel mode
  • player party gets a unique equipment item at the start of each new campaign: "A deck of cards" (when equipped, mood +1 to owner at the start of every day as the character enjoys a session of solitaire in the morning)

No promises, but we might add a few more things to this DLC as we find the time (and please feel free to share your ideas for what would be "fun to have", without impacting the game mechanics). See release notes of the main game for the details of any additions.

All the proceeds from the sale of this DLC are used exclusively on production of more awesome content for Spire of Sorcery!*

* – well, almost all – a tiny portion is spent on green tea and black coffee to keep our eyes open in the morning.

Minimum:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
